GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

exampleResponse.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles that match the input query

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article based on the input ID

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments based on the article id that matches both comments and articles

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a new comment based on the article id that matches an article ID

exampleResponse.body: this is a test comment for an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an updated votes value based on whether a positive or negative number is input

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves an empty output once the row specified has been deleted
